A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I walked out and was immediately at odds. I tried very hard to like it\, but was very conflicted. Space battles look epic as you'd expect. Kylo Ren is becoming one of the great villains but some random scenes and limiting the movie to a little slow motion chase scene.... not my favourite Star Wars movie but I applaud the filmmakers on trying something different instead of rehashing what's been done. Not sure where the next one leads but I hope it makes the decisions  employed in this movie make a bit more sense.
